rgp_client.gui.no_worlds: You have no FTB Worlds. Click 'Create FTB World' to create an FTB World!
rgp_client.gui.promo_header: Want to easily play with friends?
rgp_client.gui.promo_subheader: Create an FTB World with just a few clicks and invite your friends to join you!
rgp_client.join_request.requested: %s has requested to join your FTB World.
rgp_client.join_request.accepted: %s has accepted your invite to join their FTB World.
rgp_client.gui.button.pending: Our services are currently at capacity. We'll try and get your FTB World up and running as soon as possible.
rgp_client.gui.callback.invalid_code: The invite code provided was invalid! Ensure you have the correct code.
rgp_client.gui.callback.code_attempted_p: You have already requested to join this game server. The owner may need to accept your request.
rgp_client.gui.callback.owner_of_server: You are the owner of this game server.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_creation.loadout_d: Select the plan to use for your FTB World.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_creation.region_de: Select the region that your FTB World will be located in.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_creation.region_se: Region selection is disabled for FTB Worlds that were previously created in a different region.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_edit.title: Edit FTB World
rgp_client.gui.worlds_edit.restore_backu: Are you sure you want to restore this backup? This will overwrite the current world and any progress made since this point will be lost.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_edit.switch_confir: Are you sure you want to select this world? All players currently online will be kicked and the server be rebooted.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_edit.delete_confir: Are you sure you want to delete this world? This action cannot be undone.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_edit.no_backups: No backups have been made of this world yet.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_configuration.remo: Are you sure you want to remove %s from your FTB World?
rgp_client.gui.worlds_configuration.decl: Are you sure you want to decline %s's request to join your FTB World?
rgp_client.gui.worlds_configuration.cann: Selected world is for a different modpack
rgp_client.gui.worlds_create_invite.sing: Single-use codes automatically add a user to the world once accepted and can only be used once.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_create_invite.shar: Shared codes can be used indefinitely, but you must manually approve each user.
Click to copy invite code to clipboard.
Are you sure you want to remove this invite code?
The invite code has been copied to your clipboard.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_join_world.title: Join FTB World
rgp_client.gui.worlds_join_world.invite_: Enter the invite code you received from a friend or server admin.
rgp_client.gui.worlds_list.title: Worlds List
rgp_client.gui.worlds_list.leave_confirm: Are you sure you want to leave this FTB World? You will not be able to rejoin without a new invite from the owner.
rgp_client.requests.error.other: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
rgp_client.early_access_no_access: FTB Worlds is currently in early access. Please use the following website to sign-up if you wish to partake in early access.
